column5: Vaughan House is a spectacular 3 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms home accommodating up to 8 people. Perfect for families, groups and friends! This stunning country cottage is newly renovated and upgraded throughout in the highest standards. A claw foot tub and natural wood vanities in the bathrooms are just a few of the gorgeous features along with lush botanical toiletries. Enjoy wonderful views of the property from two private decks and many outdoor amenities including a hot tub and outdoor shower.
